greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of solutions to +- 1 +- 2 +- .. +- n = 2.
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3339 (terms < 10^1000)
formula: a(n) is the coefficient of x^2 in product(x^(-k)+x^k, k=1..n).
maple: A113036:= proc(n) local i,j,p,t; t:= NULL; for j to n do p:=1; for i to j do p:=p*(x^(-i)+x^i); od; t:=t,coeff(p,x,2); od; t; end;
mathematica: d = PadLeft[d, Length[d] + 2 n] + PadRight[d, Length[d] + 2 n];
results.author: _Floor van Lamoen_, Oct 11 2005
